attributes.action: Stop all plans to build or allow travellers sites in Market Deeping, Bourne, Langtoft, Grantham and the surrounding area's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There have been proposals to build or allow traveller's sites in Market Deeping, Bourne, Langtoft, Grantham and the surrounding area's. We do not want this. These area's are lovely unspoilt area's and we feel that allowing travellers to be here would bring down the area dramatically.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
